short_desc: PHOENIX PROGRAM involves pregnant, postpartum and early parenting women in dealing with drug and alcohol related problems
description: Phoenix Program involves pregnant, postpartum and early parenting women in dealing with drug and alcohol related problems. The program consists of: individual recovery plans, education/training groups, drug and alcohol abstinence support groups, discussion groups, in-house groups, community referrals, one-on-one sessions, on-site child care, transportation, and clean and sober activities.
